snippet: The group led by Aaron Kushner, a 39-year-old entrepreneur based in the Boston area, is buying several newspapers from Freedom Communications.
abstract: The group led by Aaron Kushner, a 39-year-old entrepreneur based in the Boston area, is buying several newspapers from Freedom Communications.

headline.main: Investor Group Buys Orange County Register and Other Newspapers
headline.print_headline: Freedom Newspapers To Be Sold To Investors
